title: Ride the wind
brief_description: Captures the essence of the sport of hang gliding. Shows experienced hang glider pilots soaring over beach ridges or flying high over rugged mountains. Cameras mounted on the wing during takeoff, flight and landing, involve the audience in the thrill of the sport.
